title: Blood-Sucking Empress - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Androgynous Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Bodyguards   Character Growth   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Immortals   Imperial Harem   Incest   Jiangshi   Matriarchy   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Polyandry   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
author: Demonic Water Grass   Mei Ye Shui Cao   魅夜水草
description: When she first transmigrated into the body of the Empress, she didn’t care about how strong her cultivation was or what the strength of the country was, but only how many beauties were present in her harem! Although three thousand could get a little chaotic at times, every beauty’s bearing and charms were different! But then why were all of her beauties so temperamental? One wrong phrase and all of them were fighting! My god, and they are martial art experts too? Beauties, take away your hands, don’t lift this imperial palace off from its foundation!>
